data.title: Countries of World
data.meta_description: Countries of World - Free download as Word Doc (.doc / .docx), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. This document lists the top 120 countries by population as of various dates between 2010-2013. It provides each country's rank, name, population size, date of population figure, percentage of world population, and source of population data. The top three most populated countries are China at 1.36 billion, India at 1.24 billion, and United States at 317 million people, collectively comprising over 40% of the world's 7.12 billion population.
